main event: Several residents of Turner, Maine observed a strange, luminous object floating in the sky during the summer of 1958 or 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as about 30 to 40 feet in diameter with a fiery-red glow and pulsating lights.,Witness observed the object for over 5 minutes before it accelerated rapidly and vanished from sight.,It was a clear evening with the moon shining brightly when the sighting occurred.,Another witness saw the object drop down to just above the trees before rising vertically and disappearing.,Reports stated that other residents also witnessed the strange object that evening.
witness description: The prime witness is an electronic operator; others include family members and local residents.
